jobDescription: Our client is a Credit/ Real Estate Hedge Fund. They're hiring a Chief Operating Officer to look after all non-investment activities within the fund. This is a new headcount, and will report to the CEO. Key duties will include looking after the Operations and Finance, Audit, Compliance and Risk Management functions of the firm, as well as weigh in solidly on matters pertaining to HR, Marketing, IT. This role is based in New York City.The COO must have 10+ years at a multi-billion dollar Hedge Fund or Private Equity Fund. Responsibilities Oversee the company's day-to-day operations; Oversee Operations, HR, Marketing/IR, Risk Management, Finance to ensure the company operational standards are met;Conduct oversight on all fund account matters, NAV, capital statement sign-offs with fund adminMonitor expenses and other operational expenditures, and cash managementSign off on financial statement reports, tax reports, forecasting, and budgetingImplement risk, compliance, and audit control functions, and meet requirements as stipulated by the regulatorsReview fund investment approvals process to ensure alignment with the fund investment process standardsBe an indelible part of next fund formation, investor due diligence, work with senior management to solicit new investors.Oversee all IT infrastructureReview and analyze all vendor contractual obligations.
